questions.question: WHAT IS AN NFT COLLECTION?
questions.answer: An NFT collection is a group of unique digital assets, each represented by a non-fungible token, typically created around a specific theme or style.

questions.question: HOW DO I PURCHASE NFTS FROM A COLLECTION?
questions.answer: To purchase nfts from a collection, you typically need to use cryptocurrency on a blockchain0based marketplace.

questions.question: CAN I SELL OR TRADE NFTS FROM A COLLECTION?
questions.answer: Yes, you can sell or trade NFTs from a collection like you would other digital assets.

questions.question: WHAT RIGHTS DO I HAVE AS AN OWNER OF AN NFT?
questions.answer: As an NFT owner, you can own, transfer, potentially access exclusive content, resell, but don't automatically get copyright or intellectual property rights.
